channel.title: CS2 Problem
channel.description: CS2 is being a bitch and every time I start it I get this error [IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/saz5tk.jpg[/img] Anyway to fix? [b]I already took it off and re-installed it on my computer which didn't do shit[/b]

item.title: CS2 Problem
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

You know an easier more permanent way to fix the problem is to go to the dir of the exe and right click on photoshop.exe and go to permissions, check the box next to your login name.

Read full topic

item.title: CS2 Problem
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

mabe right click>Run as admin

Read full topic

item.title: CS2 Problem
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

In Properties, the owner of it can set who can use it. It’s probably only set to Admin. Then again, that’s Vista. I only know it works with W2K and I think XP.

Read full topic

item.title: CS2 Problem
item.dc:creator: @Not_X_A_Alex Not X A Alex
item.description:
@Not_X_A_Alex wrote:

[quote=“nator123123, post:3, topic:177442”][quote author=Penguins link=topic=238353.msg2025026#msg2025026 date=1201845090]
Vista security problem, probably. Try right clicking it and hitting Run As Administrator.
[/quote]
WHAT HE SAID…
and make the compatibility on Windows Service Pack 2003, it kinda works better.[/quote]
Thanks, Ive never had this problem before. Can’t wait to get my HD so I can take everything off this pc I need and install XP.

Read full topic
